headline: Profit Drops 14% at Merck, Just Below Wall St. Forecast
snippet: The company reported net income of $781 million, or 26 cents a share, down from $908 million, or 30 cents a share, a year earlier....

headline: Dow and S.&P. Reach Highs On Reports of Merger Deals
snippet: Mergers involving Merck and Idenix Pharmaceuticals, and Analog Devices and Hittite Microwave, among other companies, prompted investors to buy some stocks....

headline: Merck Sales Down 4%; Profit Beats Forecasts
snippet: The pharmaceutical company’s earnings beat expectations, however, helped by sales of the diabetes drug Januvia and revenue in emerging markets....

headline: Cancer Drugs That Free Brake on Immune System Show Promise for Hodgkin’s
snippet: In two early stage studies, Bristol-Myers Squibb’s nivolumab and Merck’s pembrolizumab shrank tumors in patients with Hodgkin’s lymphoma....

headline: Hospital Pauses Test of an Ebola Vaccine Licensed to Merck
snippet: The hospital said it would halt injections of a vaccine licensed to Merck until next month, after some test subjects reported mild joint pain....

headline: Trial of 2 Ebola Vaccines’ Effectiveness Is Announced
snippet: Tests of drugs developed by GlaxoSmithKline and Merck are expected to begin in Liberia in two weeks, federal officials said....

headline: Merck Expects Delay for a Hepatitis C Therapy
snippet: The company said regulators intended to rescind the “breakthrough therapy” designation for its treatment because other new drugs were available....

headline: U.S. Expands Approval of Merck Lung Cancer Drug
snippet: Federal health officials on Friday expanded approval of an innovative Merck drug to treat patients with an advanced form of the most common lung cancer....

headline: Hepatitis C Drug From Merck Is Approved
snippet: American regulators approved a new once-daily pill for the liver-destroying virus made by Merck, which said it would sell the drug at a lower list price than its competitors....

headline: Merck Wins Hepatitis C Drug Patent Claim Against Gilead
snippet: A jury upheld the validity of Merck patents in a dispute with Gilead Sciences, which could be forced to hand over a portion of the billions of dollars it has made on hepatitis C drugs....

headline: Gilead Ordered to Pay Merck $200 Million in Patent Dispute
snippet: A federal jury on Thursday ordered Gilead Sciences to pay for infringing two Merck patents related to a lucrative cure for hepatitis C....
